properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Substantial five bedroom detached family residence offering generous living space throughout. Features include multiple reception rooms, modern kitchen/breakfast room, utility area, and two en-suite bedrooms. Externally the property benefits from a large private garden and driveway parking.

Four bedroom semi-detached home located within a sought-after residential area. The property offers a spacious lounge, open plan kitchen/diner, downstairs WC, and family bathroom. Benefits include off-street parking and a well maintained rear garden.

Stylish two bedroom apartment set within a modern development. The accommodation includes an open plan living/kitchen area, two bedrooms, and a contemporary bathroom. Additional features include lift access and allocated parking.

One bedroom ground floor flat ideal for first time buyers or investors. The property comprises a living room, fitted kitchen, double bedroom, and bathroom. Conveniently located close to local amenities and transport links.

Compact studio apartment offering an open plan living and sleeping area with fitted kitchenette and separate shower room. Ideal investment or starter property, located close to the town centre and transport connections.
